name: PARAM
description:
How to Play

1. This selestial Machine balances life and death.
2. You play as the Supremeone. 
3. Everytime  hit by a black selestial object ,You  enter lifes loop.
4.Try not to enter  life's loop.
5. when you are in the life's loop all you can do is follow the path

Param is my attempt to explain the cycle of life and death.
